DataElement.preferredName: Single Photon Emission Computed Tomography Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date when a special type of computed tomography (CT) scan in which a small amount of a radioactive drug is injected into a vein and a scanner is used to make detailed images of areas inside the body where the radioactive material is taken up by the cells was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Single Photon Emission Computed Tomography Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to a special type of computed tomography (CT) scan in which a small amount of a radioactive drug is injected into a vein and a scanner is used to make detailed images of areas inside the body where the radioactive material is taken up by the cells.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else. :A single unit of electromagnetic radiation, generally considered to be a discrete particle having no mass or charge.:A substance that is emitted or released.:A method of examining structures within the body by scanning them with X rays and using a computer to construct a series of cross-sectional scans along a single axis.

Concepts.definition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.
A single unit of electromagnetic radiation, generally considered to be a discrete particle having no mass or charge.
A substance that is emitted or released.
A method of examining structures within the body by scanning them with X rays and using a computer to construct a series of cross-sectional scans along a single axis.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

DataElementConcept.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to NRG for by script Fri Jan 24 11:30:54 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
